content: this legal document is about a divorce case between mr and mrs x they have agreed to a mutual consent divorce and have provided detailed information about their personal and financial situation they have agreed on the division of their assets debts and income as well as arrangements for their childs custody and support they have also agreed on the residence maintenance allowance and parental authority arrangements the parties have waived the right to inherit from each other and have excluded the legal reserve the agreement will take effect upon filing the divorce petition they have also agreed to waive proceedings except for certain matters the divorce will become final once the divorce decree is transcribed in the civil status registers the general administration of patrimonial documentation has determined the need to register an obligation and the parties need to provide their addresses for this purpose the notary master p has declared certain articles from the flemish tax code regarding additional fees and tax increases payable by the parties the notary has confirmed the identity of the parties and their documents the document explains the rights and obligations of the parties and the notarys role it also mentions the availability of electronic copies of deeds through the notarial deed database and the option to request a paper copy the parties have received and understood the document and have signed it
